title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Fauci suggests pausing reopenings. Marxists are dead serious about defunding the police and replacing them with social workers. Will the American electorate show character, or throw in the towel? If Durham holds his report on the coup to supposedly avoid Democrats calling him partisan and political, it's going to take the wind out of the sales of Trump's supporters. Conrad Black with a great piece on the American electorate fighting back against decline.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Judge Sullivan asks entire roster of judges to hear Flynn case, ignoring DOJ dropping the case. More from Conrad Black's piece on the American people refusing to tolerate this lawlessness and hysteria much longer. Architect says libs likening buildings to ejaculation is phallic fallacy. NBC contributor admits to lying about testing positive for COVID-19. Caller who predates the “caller abortions” requests "Thank the Lord Rush Limbaugh's On" and the Barbara Chenault Law song.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

We have a great opportunity to undermine the indoctrination at schools during lockdown. Trump has to fix public dissatisfaction with his COVID-19 response, even if it is based on fake reporting and lies, as evidenced by how well Cuomo's polling on it despite having killed thousands. Academics call citizenship fake, demand open borders. Caller declares he's not discouraged, but rather will be Voter Number One for Trump 2020. There's no compromising with these Marxists, and they have no desire to persuade you. You will obey or else if these leftists radicals defeat Trump.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
